scripts.forge-install: forge install foundry-rs/forge-std --no-commit && forge install openzeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts --no-commit && forge install sismo-core/sismo-connect-packages --no-commit && cd lib/sismo-connect-packages/packages/sismo-connect-solidity && forge install --no-commit
scripts.deploy-reputation: forge script DeployReputation --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 -vv --mnemonics 'test test test test test test test test test test test junk' --sender '0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266' --broadcast && yarn update-reputation
scripts.deploy-multi-reputations: forge script DeployMultiReputations --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 -vv --mnemonics 'test test test test test test test test test test test junk' --sender '0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266' --broadcast && yarn update-reputation
